value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Now that we have the Yggdrasill Key,
we can move against Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|I can speak the words needed to
release the magic of the key at any
time. You need only say the word.$k$pAs representative of Lord Askr,
I will do for you mortals whatever
is within my power to do...$k$p$EFace_Normal2|For you and...for my father as well.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Your father?$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|Oh! Er, um, please...pay me no mind.
I was only speaking to myself aloud.$k$p$EFace_Normal2|More importantly, please, you must
all be very cautious from here on.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Embla will be aware of our presence
at any time. We need to act—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Understood, Ash. Then let us act.
Zacharias?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|Everything is proceeding as planned.
So I do not draw attention to your
movement, we must separate here.$k$pI will take the key, and I will use
it to challenge Embla alone.$k$pThere is a chance, however, that
I lose and Embla overtakes me.$k$pIn that event, if I find you, I will most
certainly try to kill you.$k$pBut whatever happens, I may not
be free of her until my dying breath.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|If we can use the power of the
Yggdrasill Key, you could be freed
from Embla as she is destroyed.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|If we defeat her, you won't be under
her influence, Zacharias...$k$p$EFace_Smile|And then you won't have to keep
your distance from us anymore!$k$pWe could spend time together
like the old days! You still owe
me lance lessons, Zacharias!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Smile|All right. You're right. If everything
goes to plan, we can be close as
we once were.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Promise me!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Smile|I promise. Now, I must be going.
Until we meet again.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_モニカ,ch17_53_Monica_F_Normal2,Face|When I think about Her Majesty...
It's so inspiring.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|There you are, Prince Xander.
As planned, I will now make my
way to meet Embla.$k$pIf the plan Alfonse and I devised is
successful, everything we've been
working toward will be done.$k$pIn preparation for that moment,
go to Veronica, Prince Xander.$k$p$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|I understand. May luck smile on you.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|...One more request.$k$pIf we fail...$k$p$Sbs150|
